name: AI Master Prompt
summary: A comprehensive system prompt that configures AI to understand your context and work style.
explanation: An AI Master Prompt is a comprehensive system prompt designed to configure AI assistants with deep understanding of your context, preferences, expertise, writing style, and goals. It typically includes: who you are, your expertise areas, your communication preferences, your values, and guidelines for how the AI should behave. A well-crafted AI Master Prompt transforms generic AI into a personalized assistant that produces consistently relevant, appropriately-styled outputs.
